 Accomplishment_organisations: starts_at: day: 1, month: 1, year: 2020, ends_at: day: 30, month: 11, year: 2020, org_name: Reliance retail Ltd, title: Sales associate, description: "I lost my dad at my career point on September 2, 2013, when I was only 18 but my physical and mental growth is slower than everybody that time.  I am not financially stable at that time and doesn´t aware about some  basic knowledge and because of my health issue I join Reliance digital with the help of Nizam moinuddin Lari who is a old and honest employee of reliance as a sales Associate.  Just because of my health and my slowly growing nature i did not complete the joining and onboarding process and didn`t attend training with proper punctual time and missed some important training as well. After that we all have faced covid pandemic and as per government policy we all working from home than I got to know all the process and training and because of my previous job experience , I quickly figured out how to sell and the whole process and started giving a business in such a short time that you can verify with my employee code 60528011 and my managers is appreciate my work. n But I am recruiting for more road shop, but due to my stress level and all the health problems I cant handle the commute and home life and all the pressure and just because of the depression Feeling, I had to quit my job and I quit the system.  I  shared before resigning about my depression, stress and family, problems with all my managers and all the store staff and they were very supportive, even though I didn´t want to lose work because I´m the only one who wins.  Then I panicked and cried and regretted my actions very much  and tried to join again with the help of Mr Nizam moinuddin lari but was unable to do so due to my health.  I am fully aware of  my negative points and any problems that are affecting my career and continue to work until my last breath."

1. I began my career with the LG company as a customer care executive at the epicenter, where I learned how to speak with customers and provide the best service possible.
2. I have also worked for reputable real estate companies such as "your property point" and "guru Basra Properties" and from there I have learned many new skills in the area of ​​sales and marketing and got innovative and creative ideas on the sales and marketing and tax and registration process.
3. I recently worked for Reliance Digital and discovered "the ownership mindset", "integrity", "the ethics and trust policy", "teamwork"," excellent service "," customer value "and how to make happy and satisfied customer relationships and provide the best customer service of any competitor.
4. In part-time working in small shops like xerox, etc. To take experience and knowledge.
5. I started working with myself to improve my energy level, confidence level and to be physically and mentally fit in any situation to be an asset for any industry and my goal is to manage my family as a one-man army and I also want to do for my country with the help of my knowledge, skills and mistakes.
6. I want to save someone's life except natural death because of stress, financial life, married life and the whole negative side when people commit suicide.
7. I am very "kind" person, but do not show it because I believe in humanity and humanity is the greatest religion and do not want to run in the community race.
8. I want to make new real friends to create a large circle to enhance my communication and knowledge skills and enjoy and explore nature and my personal life.
9. I want to complete my further education for future needs and want to add at least one more skill in one year to my life to improve my future in a safer and more stable way. I want to work on my negative point to be more perfect than yesterday.
10. I'm a music lover, movie lover, memes lover and I love my mom after God very much and do such a hard and smart job to be a good son to my mom and pay back what she did for me. This is my life goal and I can achieve it at any cost and no obstacle and nothing in this world can stop me from achieving it.
11. I Just want to spread mankind otherwise I am a completely open-minded person an additional characteristic.
12. I want to prove to the world and create a new record of love and bonding with my mom and I want my mom to be proud of me and learn many lessons from my mom and the Bollywood industries and apply them quickly in my real life and I want to be the most successful businessman and keep working.

I am a Human Resource professional with 24+ years experience in Global Payroll Delivery, Risk & Compliance Audits, HR transformation, Business Continuity Planning, Performance Management, Stakeholder Management and Vendor Management in HR Operations / Shared Services Organisations.I have experience in migrating processes; have good knowledge and expertise on Statutory & Compliance, regulatory issues, Multi country payroll delivery & administration, HRIS, and management of end to end processes. Highly experienced in drafting and implementing policies, processes and re-engineering. Implementing technology solutions for Global Payroll, leading to better execution. My total experience of 24 plus years, in addition to the above is also spread across Accounts & Finance, HR Project Management, Payroll Integrations in to existing HR Model and Customer Services with the ability to manage efficient delivery centre.I have an experience in working with global teams across the regions such as EMEA, NA & LAR on Global projects which has an impact on risk, compliance and process improvements. I am naturally hands on, make changes happen, lead from the front and bring people with me on the journey. I am a Certified BPO Quality Analyst (CBQA) BY QAI and Six Sigma GB certified professional.

Priority of this design was to keep the cart as light weight as possible and rigid with good performance on grassy and concrete terrain used in either golf course or in hospitality, education sectors. I am a Mechanical Engineer with keen interest in CFD & Design. Over the last year i have been writing code, running Simulations with a wide array of programming languages and simulation software.

Currently I am pursing my Masters Certification Program on CFD at Skill Lync. I have a strong experience in software's such as Matlab, Python, OpenFoam, Ansys fluent, Converge CFD & Solidworks. I can code 1D, 2D - PDE's, solvers & automate processes using my Programming skills & can setup CHT , Aerodynamic, Multiphase, Combustion etc Simulations using Ansys Fluent, Converge softwares. I am also well versed in Advanced Surface modeling, Weldments packages in solidworks software.

I was a part of my college SAE BAJA team in the Chassis Department where my role was Design and Analysis & Manufacturing of Chassis. I published a project on "Design of an Electric Golf Cart with Batteries & Solar Panel for 6 Seat Capacity" where i developed an innovative tubular frame for the cart along with its sub-components.

 Accomplishment_publications: name: Cysteine proteases: Battling pathogenic parasitic protozoans with omnipresent enzymes, publisher: Microbiological Research (Impact Factor: 5.415) - Elsevier GmbH, published_on: day: 4, month: 5, year: 2021, description: The review presents the significance of cysteine proteases of members of the genera 𝘗𝘭𝘢𝘴𝘮𝘰𝘥𝘪𝘶𝘮, 𝘌𝘯𝘵𝘢𝘮𝘰𝘦𝘣𝘢, and 𝘓𝘦𝘪𝘴𝘩𝘮𝘢𝘯𝘪𝘢, known to cause Malaria, Amoebiasis, and Leishmaniasis, respectively, the protozoic diseases with the highest morbidity and mortality. Further, projecting them as targets for molecular tools like the CRISPR-Cas technology for favorable manipulation, exploration of obscure genomes, and achieving a better insight into protozoic functioning. Overcoming the hurdles that prevent us from gaining a better insight into the functioning of these enzymes in protozoic systems is a necessity. Managing the burden of parasitic protozoic infections pivotally depends upon the betterment of molecular tools and therapeutic concepts that will pave the path to an array of diagnostic and therapeutic applications., url: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.micres.2021.126784, name: Averting Transmission: A Pivotal Target to Manage Amoebiasis, publisher: Chemical Biology & Drug Design (Impact Factor: 2.817) - Wiley, published_on: day: 30, month: 4, year: 2020, description: Loopholes in the efficacious management of amoebiasis call for the development of novel methodologies to manage the same. This review presents a perspective on the essential metabolic processes and the associated molecules of 𝘌𝘯𝘵𝘢𝘮𝘰𝘦𝘣𝘢 𝘩𝘪𝘴𝘵𝘰𝘭𝘺𝘵𝘪𝘤𝘢 that can be targeted efficaciously to halt and forestall the spread of amoebiasis., url: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/32356312, name: Poster: Curbing neurodegenerative ailments using functional foods, publisher: Amity Conference of Food Scientists and Technologists - 3ʳᵈ AMIFOST on Functional Foods: Research, Innovations and Challenges, published_on: day: 18, month: 12, year: 2019, description: Neurodegenerative ailments are characterized by the progressive degeneration of the neural tissue which results in loss of memory, cognitive impairment, dysfunctional central nervous system, neuronal damage, and in severe cases, death. Currently, none of the neurodegenerative ailments are curable. Conventional treatments can only manage the symptoms of the ailment or halt the advancement of, demanding the discovery and development of methods that promote healthy ageing along with forestalling the onset of such disorders, favorable in both, financial as well as human terms. Recent researches have concluded that consumption of functional foods is linked with health benefits that are beyond those procured from crucial nutrients., url: None

I am a troubleshooter who enjoys connecting the dots: be it ideas from different disciplines, people from different teams, or applications from different industries.  I have strong technical skills and an academic background in engineering and management. My passion lies in solving problems with tailored data and communicating complex ideas to stakeholders. I am genuinely interested in building meaningful relationships and equitable communities, often creating and often connecting. I like meeting new people over a cup of coffee. Feel free to reach out at aadishsogani@gmail.com

I was a Branded Content Intern with The Economic Times,​ wherein I assisted in writing and editing content. Then it predicts the segmented text character by character to recognize the text. Once the text is recognized, the text needs to be formulated into a mathematical expression, which can be calculated to achieve the final goal of the system, i.e., evaluate an image of handwritten mathematical expressions., url: https://github.com/aaditagarwal/SolveNet, starts_at: day: 1, month: 8, year: 2020, ends_at: day: 30, month: 9, year: 2020, title: Fitment Predictor, description: "A Kivy based application to determine the fitment of an employee from the supply database for particular demand heuristics. A Fitment Score is calculated and based upon which the employee is categorised with a Fitment Segment. An individual score is calculated for each of the demand heuristics compared to the supplys attributes, and the Fitment Score is calculated by combining the weightage given to the heuristic and the respective individual score summing to 100%, i.e., the final Fitment Score. Once the Fitment Scores and Segments are determined for each employee in the supply, the recommendation for the demand is ranked in each Segment according to the hierarchical structure of the organization.", url: https://github.com/aaditagarwal/Fitment-Predictor, starts_at: day: 1, month: 7, year: 2020, ends_at: day: 31, month: 8, year: 2020, title: ActiveNet, description: Our work builds on the idea to formulate a pipeline which can detect levels of activeness in real-time, using a single RGB image of a target person. I'm a storyteller, comfortable in using both words and images to tell my tales. I'm also rather good at editing, it comes from spotting former flaws in my own work. I also do illustration, in both traditional and digital media. I'm making my own comics, and hope to self-publish soon. I don't believe in doing halfhearted work, and when I work I give it my all. I hold myself to harsh standards, and try to not let the standard of my work fall. I like internal rhyme, and absolutely adore alliteration. Seriously - sensuous susurration sinuously serenading several senses, simply spectacular.

It gives me a unique sense of contentment to be around children & shape their untapped potential. I try to model & encourage positive behaviour by creating opportunities for meaningful interactions. I use multiple methods of teaching (linguistic, visual, auditory, kinesthetic) to reach students so that no one is left behind. I use both direct & indirect ways to assess students. Direct measures may include homework, quizzes, exams, reports, essays & rubrics for oral and other performances. Indirect measures include course evaluations, student surveys & extra curriculars. Majorly my focus is on four aspects : knowledge acquired, skill development, value clarification & performance attainment. Along with unconventional teaching strategies, I respond quickly to an upset child or mediating issues between two or more children so that undesirable behaviour does not escalate. Co-curricular activities are meant to bring social skills, intellectual skills, moral values, personality progress & character appeal in students. I actively indulge in making fun plans for students like short trips around the city & help organizing school events.
